movies.overview: Dr. Victor Frankenstein, a brilliant but egotistical scientist, brings a creature to life in a monstrous experiment that ultimately leads to the undoing of both the creator and his tragic creation.
movies.title: Frankenstein

movies.overview: When a single, unattributed missile is launched at the United States, a race begins to determine who is responsible and how to respond.
movies.title: A House of Dynamite

movies.overview: When K-pop superstars Rumi, Mira and Zoey aren't selling out stadiums, they're using their secret powers to protect their fans from supernatural threats.
movies.tagline: They sing. They dance. They battle demons.
movies.title: KPop Demon Hunters

movies.overview: An ambitious hotelier and her reluctant daughter take a trip to Málaga, where they find what they've been craving in a farmer's idyllic mango orchard.
movies.title: Mango

movies.original_title: Dora and the Lost City of Gold
movies.overview: Dora, a girl who has spent most of her life exploring the jungle with her parents, now must navigate her most dangerous adventure yet: high school. Always the explorer, Dora quickly finds herself leading Boots (her best friend, a monkey), Diego, and a rag tag group of teens on an adventure to save her parents and solve the impossible mystery behind a lost Inca civilization.
movies.title: Dora and the Lost City of Gold

movies.overview: Advertising executive Nick Marshall is as cocky as they come, but what happens to a chauvinistic guy when he can suddenly hear what women are thinking? Nick gets passed over for a promotion, but after an accident enables him to hear women's thoughts, he puts his newfound talent to work against Darcy, his new boss, who seems to be infatuated with him.
movies.tagline: He has the power to hear everything women are thinking. Finally... a man is listening.
movies.title: What Women Want

movies.overview: Amid the glittering casinos of Macau, a gambler running from his past — and his debts — becomes fascinated by an enigmatic woman at the baccarat table.
movies.title: Ballad of a Small Player

movies.overview: A young lawyer defends a black man accused of murdering two white men who raped his 10-year-old daughter, sparking a rebirth of the KKK.
movies.tagline: Experience a time you'll never forget.
movies.title: A Time to Kill

movies.original_title: Aileen: Queen of the Serial Killers
movies.overview: Aileen Wuornos remains a rarity: a female serial killer. From childhood abuse to death-row revelations, this documentary revisits her life and crimes.
movies.title: Aileen: Queen of the Serial Killers

movies.overview: Years after resigning command of an elite military police unit, the nomadic, righter-of-wrongs Reacher is drawn back into the life he left behind when his friend and successor, Major Susan Turner is framed for espionage. Reacher will stop at nothing to prove her innocence and to expose the real perpetrators behind the killings of his former soldiers.
movies.tagline: Never give in. Never give up. Never go back.
movies.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back

tv_shows.name: Rhythm + Flow France
tv_shows.overview: French rappers freestyle, battle and write their way to a game-changing 100,000 euro prize in a music competition series judged by Niska, Shay and SCH.

last_episode_to_air.name: Baptism of Fire
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the Continent sinks deeper into war, Geralt, Yennefer and Ciri each meet their fate on the roads they took to avoid it.

tv_shows.name: The Witcher
tv_shows.overview: Geralt of Rivia, a mutated monster-hunter for hire, journeys toward his destiny in a turbulent world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: The witcher Geralt, a mutated monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world in which people often prove more wicked than beasts.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Geralt embraces his destiny as he protects Ciri from the forces battling for control of the Continent — and from the mysterious power she possesses.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Destiny brought them together. Dangerous forces are trying to tear them apart. Geralt and Yennefer fight to keep Ciri safe as war brews on the Continent.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: After the Continent-altering events of Season Three, Geralt, Yennefer, and Ciri find themselves separated by a raging war and countless enemies. As their paths diverge, and their goals sharpen, they stumble on unexpected allies eager to join their journeys. And if they can accept these found families, they just might have a chance at reuniting for good...

last_episode_to_air.name: What Was Your Name Again?
last_episode_to_air.overview: Folke makes Ashley an enticing offer at an impossible price. Trying to help her friend, Tea comes face-to-face with the last person she wants to see.

tv_shows.name: The Asset
tv_shows.overview: A young agent goes undercover to befriend a drug smuggler's wife. But the closer she gets to her target, the more complicated her mission becomes.

last_episode_to_air.name: Fire
last_episode_to_air.overview: With her enemies closing in and The Jackal slipping away, Betty ends up back where she started — but with one more card to play. Will it be enough?

tv_shows.name: Amsterdam Empire
tv_shows.overview: When Jack's affair comes to light, his wife Betty hatches a bitter plan to strip him of the thing he loves most: The Jackal, his coffeeshop empire.

last_episode_to_air.name: The Board
last_episode_to_air.overview: The board meets to decide Profeta's future. Xavier maneuvers Santiago into leading the samba school and long-buried secrets finally come to light.

tv_shows.name: Rulers of Fortune
tv_shows.overview: A young man aspires to rise through the ranks of Rio's gambling underworld — unaware of the dangerous game of betrayal, lust and blood that awaits him.

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: After meeting him, Otto realises the extent of Mulligan's obsession and determination. Elizabeth confesses what has been going on and they hatch a plan.

tv_shows.name: Breathless
tv_shows.overview: Hospital drama set in London during the early 1960s, following the staff of a busy gynecology ward at a time when abortion is illegal and the contraceptive pill is only just becoming available to married women.

last_episode_to_air.name: When Noah Met Joanne
last_episode_to_air.overview: The complexities of love get all too real at a lavish celebration, as Joanne and Noah question what's worth holding onto — and what's slipping away.

tv_shows.name: Nobody Wants This
tv_shows.overview: An agnostic sex podcaster and a newly single rabbi fall in love, but can their relationship survive their wildly different lives and meddling families?

last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 5
last_episode_to_air.overview: With evidence in hand that could break the case against Capt. Ułasiewicz, Piotr races against time to present it at the trial.

tv_shows.name: Heweliusz
tv_shows.overview: After a catastrophic ferry disaster, the off-duty captain seeks answers and justice for those who lost their lives — and those they left behind.

last_episode_to_air.name: Secure the Bag
last_episode_to_air.overview: Gossip tabloids are abuzz when Montcler hosts a luxury event in collaboration with Moghel Slay… but will the woman of the hour make a live appearance?

tv_shows.name: Bad Influencer
tv_shows.overview: A single mother — and luxury bag counterfeiter — finds herself teaming up with a self-obsessed influencer to sell her bags and scrape her way out of debt.

last_episode_to_air.name: Destiny of the Republic
last_episode_to_air.overview: Conkling goes on the offensive as Garfield challenges the New York political machine. Isolated and desperate, Guiteau weighs a history-making decision.

tv_shows.name: Death by Lightning
tv_shows.overview: The story of James Garfield, who rose from obscurity to become America's 20th President — and Charles Guiteau, the man who assassinated him.
